title: Football at the 1979 Mediterranean Games
text:
The 1979 Mediterranean Games football tournament was the 8th edition of the <a href="Football%20at%20the%20Mediterranean%20Games">Mediterranean Games men's football tournament</a>. The <a href="association%20football">football</a> tournament was held in <a href="Split%2C%20Croatia">Split</a>, <a href="Yugoslavia">Yugoslavia</a> between 21 and 29 September 1979 as part of the <a href="1979%20Mediterranean%20Games">1979 Mediterranean Games</a> and was contested by 8 teams.
Participating teams.
Eight teams took part in the tournament.
Tournament.
"All times local : <a href="Time%20zone">Time zone</a> (<a href="UTC%2B1">UTC+1</a>)"
